pages.text:
$(italic)Unlike the comparatively primitive Crafting Table, crafting in the Pigment Pedestal takes some time.
You found that the time these crafting processes took increased steadily with the complexity of the components.$(br)This focus should help you bring the crafting times back to acceptable levels. It helps the Pigment Pedestal collect the energy focused by the structure.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Place the Pedestal Crafting Accelerator on top one of the four gemstone blocks close to your $(l:general/pedestal)Pigment Pedestal$().$(br)They also work for the $(l:general/fusion_shrine)Fusion Shrine$(/), when placed on one of the chiseled blocks.$(br2)Each additional Accelerator has an increased effect.
